titles.title: This Is Your House
As we gather in this Place today

properties.copyright: 2004 Juniper Landing Music (Admin. by CopyCare Deutschland)Integrity's Hosanna! Music (Admin. by SCM Verlagsgruppe GmbH)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As we gather in this place today
Holy Spirit come and have Your way, Have Your way
As we lay aside our own desires
Sweep across our hearts with holy fire, Have Your way

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is Your house, Your home, We welcome You, Lord, we welcome You
This is Your house, Your home
We welcome You today
We welcome You today, We welcome You today
We welcome You today

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As we offer up our hearts and lives
Let them be a living sacrifice, Have Your way
Be glorified in everything we do
Be glorified in everything we say, Have Your way

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
As we pray, O Lord, draw near
It's Your voice we long to hear
